name: Chat Application

projectPages.title: Description
projectPages.content:
A chat application built with **React**, **Socket.io**, **MongoDB** and **Express**. Real time chat update, friends notifications and more thanks to Socket connection with the Express backend.

Full backend authentication and user data storage for friends, messages and account settings. Storage in cloud using **Mongo Atlas DB**.

projectPages.title: Features
projectPages.content:
• **Longin/Registration**: Login, Registration and Logout functionality implemented with JWT.

  • **Security**: Password encryption. User input validation and sanitization.

  • **Live actualization**: Live chat and message update with Socket.io.

    • **Customization**: Full user accout customization, light/dark theme, private mode and more.

images.text: Get notified when user is connected

description: A chat app built with react ad socket.io

name: Calculator

projectPages.title: Description
projectPages.content:
A fully functional, responsive and intuitive calculator built with React.

The main focus was its functionality and view accross many devises. It has support for complex functions like trigonometry functions.

description: A fully functional calculator built with React

name: Docs page

projectPages.title: Description
projectPages.content:
A technical documentation page built with plain **HTML**, **Javascript** and with **SASS**.

Responsive design of the page, nav links to move across the page without scrolling and a grey theme.

It shows documentation about basic programming with **Javascript** and how to start with it.

description: A documentation page built with plain html, javascript and SASS

name: Landing page

projectPages.title: Description
projectPages.content:
A product landing page with a light theme built using plain **HTML** and **Javascript**, also styled with **SASS**.

Built to showcase a theme for e-commerce sites and show how responsive design change how products and articles are displayed across the page.

description: A product landing page built with html, javascript and SASS

name: Tribute page

projectPages.title: Description
projectPages.content:
A tribute page about Dr. Norman Borlaug. Built with **HTML** **Javascript** and **SASS**

Showcase a responsive design along with a nice dark theme.

images.text: A tribute page about Dr. Norman Borlaug

description: A Tribute page built with html, javascript and SASS

name: Movie Searcher

projectPages.title: Description
projectPages.content:

It uses the OMDB API to get movies according to the users queries.

description: A search application for movies built with React
